document_data.name: ''Belt of the Witch''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''belt of the witch''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[belts|belt]] worn by [[warlock]]s. It could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The wearer of a ''belt of the witch'' could activate it to cast ''[[hypnotic pattern]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Farideh]], a [[tiefling]] warlock who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
